name: Paintball Multiplayer V3
description: Paintball Multiplayer V3 is a computer multiplayer game that is based on a server and 1 or more clients. To play the game download the server version on the computer that will be the host for the game. And download the client game on each device you will play on. First open the server and get the Ip from typing ipconfig in command prompt to know the local id of the server and the type the local id to enter the game from the client device, Enjoy!
